Description:
Lonsdale Mex Pro Fight Glove


The Lonsdale mex Pro Fight Glove has been designed with premium Mexican leather that maximizes flexibility and wrist comfort. This glove has been filled with custom horse hair and foam blend, which allows for optimum power transfer.
The Glove has been hand crafted in Mexico in the traditional style, to ensure quality. This Lonsdale Mex Pro Fight Glove is the ideal punchers glove.

Lonsdale Face saver Headguard



The Lonsdale Face Saver headguard uses the latest design and utilizes a padded crossbar to protect from direct hits to the face, while still allowing a full range of vision. Large padded ear holes to increase the protection, and adjustable top and rear lace closures create a comfortable and secure fit. Outer shell is completely constructed on genuine leather and the interior is lined with a moisture wicking material for quick drying and keeping the head cool during training.

Lonsdale Face Saver Headguard
> Genuine leather outer shell
> Padded crossbar
> Adjustable top and rear closure
> Moisture wicking material
> Lonsdale logo

The Lonsdale heavy hitters trainers vest body protector is the perfect coaching tool for all your boxing training sessions, with a moulded hard wearing outer coupled with a super shock absorbing padded inner. Lonsdale M-Core Sparring Head guard



The Lonsdale M-Core Sparring Head guard is made with m-core mesh moisture wicking breathable shell. the m-core head guard is made with perforated foam inner padding providing ventilation, and regulation of temperature to optimise performance. The thick cheek protectors add protection without obstructing view, as well as adding additional safety. The head guard comes with adjustable clip chin lock and strap and also hook & loop rear closure to minimize shifting during rigorous

The Lonsdale X-Lite Headguard has a unique outer shell construction, utilising ultra strong lightweight technology materials, with L-core layered foam inner padding, which delivers optimum protection for all sparring.
